mapper.insert: insert into catalog (CATALOG_ID, CATALOG_NAME, CATALOG_TYPE, CATALOG_DESC, CATALOG_NBR, CATALOG_USAGE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK) values (#{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update catalog set CATALOG_NAME = #{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_TYPE = #{catalogType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_DESC = #{catalogDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_NBR = #{catalogNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_USAGE = #{catalogUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_REGION_ID = #{applyRegionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CATALOG_ID, CATALOG_NAME, CATALOG_TYPE, CATALOG_DESC, CATALOG_NBR, CATALOG_USAGE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from catalog where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CATALOG_ID, CATALOG_NAME, CATALOG_TYPE, CATALOG_DESC, CATALOG_NBR, CATALOG_USAGE, APPLY_REGION_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, REMARK from catalog
